Detailed Description

SimpleScheduler is the simplest possible Scheduler implementation, and works independently from the underlaying operating system specifics. All Applications share the same callstack, which means that:
  • Nested ActiveWaits of different Applications might lead to a deadlock.
  • Nested ActiveWaits will lead to a stack overflows on limited stacksize.
